messages.subject: Roblox was Re: graphic novels
messages.msgSnippet: There are some less motion-intensive games on Roblox, it s just a matter of finding them I think. I d have to ask DH and DS about them. Oh, yeah, some are more
messages.messageBody:
There are some less motion-intensive games on Roblox, it's just a
matter of finding them I think. I'd have to ask DH and DS about them.
Oh, yeah, some are more "building" oriented rather than the running
around type "obbys" and such (an "obby" for non-Robloxians, is an
obstacle course). Those might be somewhat doable - I've been able to
watch them for short times, as long as there's not a lot of people in
that one game. I'll see if DH or DS have any good 'places' that they've
built that aren't too motion-busy. Maybe that would be a good project
for DH - he's getting into the guts and programming stuff from scratch.

Deb R
